SEARCH
Package uk.ac.aber.cs21120.knockout.interfaces

Interface IGroup

All Known Implementing Classes:
Group
public interface IGroup
Each group consists of four teams, indexed 0-3. There must be a constructor which takes an array of teams, e.g. Group(ITeam[] teams) Every team plays every other team in the group once. This will modify the scores of the teams in the group: Winning team: +3 points Losing team: 0 points Draw: +1 point to each team

  • Method Details

    • getNextMatch

      IGroupMatch getNextMatch()
      Return the next unplayed match, ready to have its result set. If no matches are left, return null.
      Returns:
      an unplayed match or null.

    • getPoints

      int getPoints(ITeam team)
      Return the points for a given team.
      Parameters:
      team -
      Returns:
      number of points

    • getTable

      ITeam[] getTable()
      return an array of the teams in points order, with the team with the highest points first.
      Returns:
      array of teams
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if any matches have not been played
